info.label: Information
info.text: By clicking the button you can view additional information about a screen and its text.

navigation.label: Navigace
navigation.text: Navigational buttons allow you to move freely through an exposition. The button on the right side of the screen moves you forward and the button on the left side of the screen moves you backwards.

chapters.label: Chapters
chapters.text: Button opens a menu with all chapters and screens of an exposition. You can than navigate to individual screens by clicking.

audio.label: Audio
audio.text: This button allows you to control audio.

play.label: Playback
play.text: Exposition can be paused. By using the same button you can then resume the exposition.

dragThumb.label: Drag thumb
dragThumb.text: You can reveal the underlying image by dragging.
